title: Energetická data - komerční nemovitosti
content: Nejvce v kancelch pltvme bhem sttnch svtk Enectiva wwwenectivacz je online nstroj pro energetick monitoring kter doke nejen odhalovat pltvn motivovat k sporm ale tak poskytovat mnoho informac o energetickch spotebch Ty nsledn leccos vypovdaj o naem bnm chovn Statistiky kter zde prezentujeme byly vytvoeny ze vzorku 480 administrativnch budov v mstech nad 10tis obyvatel po cel esk republice Dle spoteby elektrick energie pracujeme nejvce v ter a hned pot v pondl Od stedy je to s na pracovitost m dl hor Rozdl mezi terkem a ptkem kdy se dle spoteby pracuje nejmn je v prmru 601 Tento rozdl je vraznj ve vtch openspace kancelch ne v mench do 200m2 kde in tento rozdl pouze 363 O vkendu klesne spoteba kancele v prmru o 5417 v porovnn se spotebou bhem pracovnho tdne Co se te mrnho ukazatele spoteny na m2 uitn plochy budovy tak nejvt proceto budov vykazuje spotebu 525 kWhm2 za rok Vdy velmi zvis na technologich budovy a zda je budova strojov chlazena i nikoli Se spotebou vody je to velmi obdobn Nejvce vody se pes pracovn tden spotebuje v pondl a hned pot v ter Nejmen spoteba je opt v ptek Rozdl mezi pondlkem a ptkem inn 589 Bhem vkendu je patrn dramatick pokles o 87 a v podstat stejn pokles nastv i ve sttn svtky Mrn ukazatel spoteby na uitnou plochu budovy vykazuje nejastji hodnotu 165 lm2 za rok U tepla a plynu je situace mnohem pestej Na jeho spotebu m vliv nejen nae ptomnost v kancelch a nae chovn ale i vliv poas a to zejmna venkovn teploty Z tohoto dvodu nem smysl porovnvat jednotliv dny mezi sebou jeliko ve vtin ppad kopruj pouze venkonvn teplotu Zajmavm dajem je vak pokles spoteby o vkendu kter zna sprvn nastaven tlumu vytpn a sprvnou regulaci objektu Vzali jsme proto spoteby v jednotliv ptky a porovnali je s nejblimi sobotami Pokles inil 2831 A pot nedln spoteby s pondlnmi kde inil pokles spoteby na vytpn 3879 Nejvt procento budov vykazuje mrn ukazatel spoteby tepla na m2 plochy hodnotu 135 kWhm2 za rok Vtina budov se pak pohybuje v rozmez 95200 kWhm2 tepla za rok U vech energi je zajmavm dajem rozdl spoteby mezi sttnm svtkem a vkendem Z hlediska obsazenosti a odveden prce meme sttn svtek povaovat za srovanteln s nedl a takt spoteba by tomu mla odpovdat Nicmn spoteba elektiny ve sttn svtek je v prmru o 48 vy ne prv v nedli a v ppad tepla se jedn o dov vy hodnoty Ve sttn svtky je spoteba tepla o 2840 vy ne bhem nejbliho vkendu Spoteba tedy defacto odpovd bnmu pracovnmu dnu To jen odhaluje potencil jak je mono vyut pi zvyovn energetick efektivity v komernch nemovitostech

title: Kde je vhodné instalovat měřidla energií
content: V posledn dob se mno dotazy naich zkaznk na tma kam instalovat midla ppadn detailnj podrun men Chtj aby nsledn men energi dvalo smysl a mlo ekonomick pnos K instalac men ppadn podrunho men mete pistoupit z nkolika smr Kad z nich m sv vhody i nevhody a nelze jednoznan urit kter z nich je nejlep Pstup se bude vdy drobn odliovat od elu a msta svho nasazen stejn tak od aktuln situace na dan navrhujeme mit podrun alespo 70 celkov spoteby danho arelu i provozu asto se setkvme se stanovenm hranice pkonu od kter klienti chtj mit I certifikan autority jako BRE nebo GBCI stanovuj hranice dle pkonu spotebi nicmn tento pstup nerespektuje hledisko spoteby kter je dle naeho nzoru dleitj Pikon jet nic nek o ase po kter je tento pkon odebrn Pokud chcete posunout podrun men jet k smysluplnj dan energie dle msta Napklad dle jednotlivch njemnk v administrativnch budovch i bytovch domech nebo dle hospodskch stedisek ekonomickch jendotek ve firmch Hlavnm motivem takovhoto rozdlen je jasn dn title: Měření spotřeby vody
content: Mezi midla spoteb energi bezpochyby pat i vodomry Jedn se o zazen kter m prton objem vody uzavenm potrubm typicky v m3 za dan asov obdob a z na zkuenosti vyplv e voda pat mezi nejastj medium odbratelem a dodavatelem vody Takov vodomry mus bt oznaeny za stanoven midla a s periodou pti let musej bt kalibrovny Tyto vodomry musej bt umstny na kadou vodovodn ppojku veejnho vodovodu nejastji mezi n a vlastn vodovod Pro rozpoten spoteby vody mezi vce odbratel slou bytov vodomr Provozn vodomr slou k intern poteb provozovatele Jedn se o vodomry v pravnch vod vodojemech Dle pro el provoz vroby a to pedevm v prmyslu maj informativn charakter nemus se jednat o kalibrovan midla Principy men spoteby vody se odvj od konstrukce danho vodomru Podle umstn pevodovho stroj se rozliuj dva zkladn typy vodomr Mokrobn jejich selnk je pln zaplaven vodou a suchobn jejich soustroj je umstno mimo vodu Pot rozliujeme tyto vodomry Rychlostn vodomry jedn se o nejpouvanj typy vodomr Men probh na principu psoben dynamickho tlaku vody na obn kolo rotor Poet otek je pmo mrn objemu prol vody Hodnoty potu otek jsou mechanicky nebo magneticky peneny na potadlo selnk Na selnku lze tak pest stav vodomru tzn objem vody v m3 za dobu provozu midla Tyto rychlostn vodomry meme dle dlit na dva zkladn typy lopatkov a roubov Woltmanv Lopatkov funguj na principu rozten lopatkovho kola mono si pedstavit jako malou turbnu Tyto vodomry jsou pouiteln na prtok do 20 m3 za hodinu Nevhodou tchto vodomr je mal pesnost men pi malch prtocch U roubovch vodomr je dynamickm tlakem vody rozteno speciln roubov kolo Tyto vodomry se pouvaj pro objekty s velkm odbrem vody vce jak 20 m3 za hodinu Vhodou tchto roubovch vodomr oproti lopatkovm je nzk tlakov ztrta a vt pesnost men Objemov vodomry tyto typy funguj na principu pmho men objemu prol vody zaznamenvaj poet naplnn komor danho objemu vodou Jedn se o sloitj konstrukci oproti ve uvedenm typm Objemov vodomry jsou t pesnj Vyuvaj se pi nzkch prtocch od 2 l za hodinu Prezov vodomry m spotebu vody na principu hydraulickho tlaku U tchto vodomr je men rozdl tlaku ped a za prtonm profilem Dky hydraulickm rovnicm je tak odvozena hodnota objemu prol vody Zsadn soust tohoto vodomru je krtc prvek Jsou ureny pro mal prezy potrub zpsobuj pomrn znan tlakov ztrty Tangenciln vodomry principieln se jedn o rychlostn vodomr rozdlem je e obn prvek zasahuje pouze do sti prezu Jsou vhodn jako provozn vodomr napklad do zemdlskch provoz kde midly mohou prochzet drobn mechanick neistoty Elektromagnetick indukn vodomry pracuje na principu snmn indukovanho napt kter vznik pohybem kapaliny v magnetickm poli Jedn se o bezdotykov midla sloen ze snmae indukn idlo v potrub a pevodnku dc jednotka vyhodnocujc daje V prezu armatury tud nen dn mechanick kus Men title: Možnosti energetických úspor na zimním stadionu
content: V esk republice je celkem 190 zimnch stadion Vtina z nich je v majetku mst a obc nebo firem kter vlastn takt msto Z technickho pohledu se jedn o velmi komplexn budovy s mnoha technologiemi s vysokou energetickou nronost V tomto lnku se pokusme shrnout zkladn monosti energetickch spor na zimnch stadionech 1 Teplota ledu Velmi asto je teplota ledu nastavena na zbyten nzk hodnoty Pitom pi hokejovm zpasu dle zkuenost postauje teplota ledu 5 C Pi dalch sportech kter jsou na zmnch stadionech provozovny je mon teplotu ledu dle zvyovat U hokejovho trninku na 4 C krasobruslen 3 C a u veejnho bruslen pak na 2 C spora vygenerovan zvenm teploty ledu se pohybuje v du 4060 MWhrok v zvislosti na pouit technologii 2 Tlouka ledu Na mnoha stadionech je led zbyten moc tlust Za ideln tlouku se povauj 3 cm pi kter je ideln pomr kvality spoteby elektrick energie a mnostv pouit vody Stejn tak je mon mnohem rychleji mnit teplotu ledu pi jeho men tlouce a tm pdem generujeme dal spory 3 Provoz aten a zzem Jsou ti hlavn oblasti kde mete uetit pi provozu v atnch a zzem Prvn z nich je elektina za osvtlen kde pichz v vahu een pomoc technologi s nzkou spotebou jako jsou LED svtidla V provozech kde se ale nesvt alespo 10h denn je doba nvratnosti u tchto technologi znan dlouh Mnohem pijatelnj je instalace pohybovch idel kter zabrn svcen v prostorech v dobch bez ptomnosti osob Druhou oblast je pprave tepl vody Zkladem je sprvn nastaven teploty na 55 C nastaven cirkulanch erpadel kter b jen pokud je poadavek na teplou vodu ppadn pokud teplota na najevzdlenjm mst poklesne pod poadovanou teplotu Ohev vody me zajistit odpadn teplo z chlazen ppadn vmnk napojen na edou vodu ze sprch Tet oblast je spoteba samotn vody V ppad novch provoz nebo rozshlej rekonstrukc pipadaj v vahu systmy na zptn vyuit ed vody nap na splachovn ale zcela jist jsou velmi dobe pouiteln asovae na sprchovch baterich i u umyvadel U tch je vhodn naistalovat i perltory na snen prtoku vody 4 Vytpn I na zimnm stadionu jsou technologie vytpn a to jak aten tak administrativnch st klubu a lze na nm znan uetit pokud je efektivn nastaveno a provozovno Standardem by mlo bt nasazen ekvitermn regulace s vlastn kivkou pro kadou otopnou vtev v kombinaci s idli intern teploty Stejn tak monost nastavit tlumy jednotliv pro kadou z tchto vtv tak aby se v prostorech netopilo zbyten v dob kdy nejsou vyuvny Velk zdroj chladu nahrv monostem vyut jeho odpadn teplo ale zde zle vdy na konkrtn technick dispozici danho stadionu a monostech napojen 5 Osvtlen ledov plochy Pokud pemlte o vmn osvtlen nad ledovou plochou potejte e nvratnost takovhoto projektu se pohybuje dle doby provozu ledov plochy od 8 do 13 let Dal vhodou LED osvtlen je ni tepeln zen pedvan do prostoru konvekc Tm pdem i ni nklady na chlazen Samozejmost jsou klasick vysokonkladov opaten jako zateplen administrativnch st vmna oken a dve za modern s nzkm souinitelem prostupu tepla instalace chlazen s vysokm chladcm faktorem EER Nezmnili jsme se o optimalnm mnostv vody a teplot vody kter je nutn na pravu ledov plochy a m vliv na spotebu energie pro chlazen o eench rekuperace na adsorbnch jednotkch kter zajiuj sniovn vlhkosti nebo o monostech nasazen kogeneranch jednotek Opaten kter je mon realizovat na zimnch stadionech je cel ada Pokud si pejete nechat zpracovat energetick audit firmou kter se specializuje na vyhledvn title: Energieaudit oder ISO 50001?
content: Haben Sie ein groes Unternehmen und entscheiden Sie sich ob ISO 50001 einzufhren oder Energieaudit durchzufhren um die gltige Legislative von 5Dezember 2015 zu erfllen Wir bringen ein paar Argumente fr und gegen die einzelnen Varianten die Ihnen bei der Entscheidung helfen knnten Falls Sie auch nach dem Durchlesen Zweifel haben zgern Sie sich nicht unser Team ggf Team der Gesellschaft Enerfis zu kontaktieren Variante ISO 50001 Argumente fr Es handelt sich um ein komplexes Werkzeug das die ganze Firma beeinflusst und betrifft alle Abteilungen von HR bis zu Gebudeverwaltung Es beeinflusst die Prozesse innerhalb des Unternehmens aber auch die Lieferantenbeziehungen Falls die Prozesse richtig eingestellt sind dann wird das System und die Leute dauernd neue Verbesserungsideen bilden Jedes Jahr im Rahmen ISO 50001 wird eine berprfung der eingestellten Prozesse durch einen unabhngigen Auditor bei einem berwachungsaudit und bei einer Rezertifizierung durchgefhrt Argumente gegen Meistens lngere Einfhrungszeit und lngere Zeit bis zu greifbaren Ergebnissen Viel Verwaltung rundherum die Ihr Unternehmen unntig belasten und bremsen knnen Meistens ist der Preis fr Einfhrung Zertifizierung anschliessende berwachungsaudits und Rezertifizierungen hher als bei einem Energieaudit Der Preis ist beeinflusst durch Anzahl der Energieaudits also durch Anzahl der einzelnen Standorte Wenn es mehrere Standorte in einem Unternehmen gibt dann ist der Preis fr Energieaudits fast gleich wie bei Einfhrung von ISO 50001 Variante Energieaudit Argumente fr Die Bearbeitungszeit und die Zeit zu Erreichung der konkreten Ergenisse ist viel mehr krzer als im Falle der Einfhrung der ISO 50001 Energieaudit belastet nicht administrativ die ganze Firma lst konkrete Bereiche und definiert konkrete Outputs Bei einem Standort oder ein paar Standorten kommt die Variante Energieaudit billiger als die Variante ISO 50001 Sie fhren ein Audit laut gltiger Legislative durch und die nchsten 4 Jahre haben Sie Ruhe sie mssen keine berwachungsaudits und Rezertifizierungen durchfhren lassen Argumente gegen Es handelt sich nur um einen Schuss alle vier Jahre der nicht die mglichen Sparmanahmen in der Zwischenzeit beurteilen kann Es ist kein komplexes Werkzeug Wenn es zu einer Neugestaltung oder grerer nderung am Standort wo das Audit durchgefhrt wurde kommt verliert somit das neue Audit seine Gltigkeit Die meisten Auditoren werden Sparmanahmen aussuchen die langfristige Rckflussdauer haben wie zB Dmmung Fensterwechsel Heizungssystem Wechsel usw Solche Manahmen sind dann in den kommerziellen Bereich im Grunde unmglich zu verwirklichen Dieses Argument kann man mit der Wahl des geeigneten Auditors ausgleichen zB vom Team Enerfis wo man gezielt geschult ist die Manahmen suchen die geringe oder keine Kosten verursachen Wir hoffen dass Ihnen diese Argumente beim Entscheiden helfen knnen welche Variante zu whlen Falls Sie doch noch Zweifel haben zgern Sie sich nicht uns zu kontaktieren wir beraten Sie gerne Ggf bieten wir unseren Kunden Bearbeitung der SWOT Analyse mit konkreter Situation bei konkreter Firma Sie knnen Fachleute von Team Enerfis wie auch von Team Enectiva kontaktieren

title: Energiedaten - kommerzielle Immobilien

wird eine langfristigere Funktionieren der Firma bei den Managern ganz unterlassen Aus diesen Grnden ist es ntig die strategischen Ziele in dem Bereich Energie Management auf der Ebene vom Topmanagement setzen die Legislative Der nchste Faktor der rein als Muss und nur als nchster Kostenfaktor fr die Firma wahrgenommen wird Dennoch hat die Legislative in der letzten Zeit einen bedeutenden Einfluss bei Einfhrung der energiesparenden Manahmen in den Firmen bei Investitionen in Sanierungsarbeiten zB Gebudedmmung Die Schlufolgerung ist dann auch Erhhung der Energie Effizienz Die heutige Legislative lst leider nicht so viel das Auswerten und somit handelt es sich oft um eine Investition die nicht ganz Rckvergtung bringt Motivation ist Treibkraft nicht nur im Falle des Energie Managements Wenn Sie Hilfe mit Einstellung der Ziele der Energie Effizienz in Ihrer Firma brauchen zgern Sie sich nicht an unseren Team zu wenden

title: Neugierigkeit in Energie Management
content: Sind Sie genug neugierig Neugierigkeit ist eine angeborene Eigenschaft Sobald wir das Licht von diesem Welt erblicken fangen wir an zu entdecken erkennen versuchen Leider die meisten von uns je lter sie sind verlieren die Sehnsucht und Motivation nach Neugierigkeit Wahrscheinlich gilt hier wer ist neugierig wird bald alt tschechisches Sprichwort Neugierigkeit als Eigenschaft ist aber auch sehr wichtig wenn man Energie Effizienz erreichen will Ein Modelbeispiel ein Brogebude mit den Mietern und dem Gebudeverwalter Der Gebudeverwalter als Vertreter von Gebudebesitzer hat die Aufgabe alle Energien so abzurechnen damit er nichts zahlen muss Es ist einfach im Falle die Energien werden nur durch Hauptmessgerte gemessen und werden nach dem Flchenverhltnis abgerechnet Am besten durch bezahlte Anzahlungen und Rckverrechnung der tatschlichen Kosten In diesem System ist es eigentlich unmglich die Energien effizienz zu nutzen weil hier die Motivation irgendetwas zu ndern fehlt Schlssel zur nderung ist Druck und Neugierigkeit der Mieter Nur sie wenn sie anfangen sich dafr zu interessieren wie viel sie verbraucht haben und welcher Verbrauch steht hinter ihrer Energierechnungen haben Kraft die Einstellung von dem Besitzer zu ndern Genauso wenn sie sich fr Anzahlungshhe oder Hhe der Zahlungen fr Energien in anderen hnlichen Gebuden interessieren knnen sie feststellen wie effizient sie mit den Energien umgehen Haben Sie jemals ihren Nachbaren gefragt wie ist sein Strom oder Wasserverbrauch im Monat Neugierigkeit ist auch ausschlaggebend fr Energie Manager Profis die sich tglich mit den Diagrammen und Tabellen mit den Leistungen Verbruchen Hchstwerten und Kleinstwerten befassen Nur wenn der Energie Manager Sehnsucht hat die Abweichungen und Schwankungen zu entschlsseln oder nur die ausgewerteten Zahlen fr sich selber begrnden kann er erfolgreich sein Haben Sie sich jemals berlegt um wie viel kann man Energieverbrauch senken beim der maximalen Nutzungseffizienz Seien Sie neugierig

title: Basic Principles of Energy Monitoring
content: Are you wondering how can energy including water consumption be easily monitored Here are several tips on efficient energy monitoring and on approaches and processes that are applied in the development of Enectiva a complete tool for online energy monitoring Rules of energy monitoring A simple and comprehensible energy monitoring means more users will understand it and be able to use it which consequently means more people will be motivated to save energy and reduce consumption It is a mistake to see energy monitoring as a highly technical discipline intended only for corporate power engineers Energy management as well as monitoring which is related to it are closely connected to economics The makers of systems of energy monitoring should keep this in mind the monitoring systems should be comprehensible even to people engaged in financial matters Moreover if the system is kept simple and easy to understand costs of training of new users are significantly reduced The rule of thumb is that a good system of energy monitoring should serve the needs of the user not the other way around as we often see in corporate ERP information systems Availability means seeing data online Your data should be available anytime anywhere especially today when flexibility and promptness of decision is a soughtafter commodity and a competitive advantage Having your energy data online makes it is possible to have automatic reports and wasting alerts sent directly to your email address or even your mobile phone An open but safe system based on open interfaces provides the user with the option to choose and to make changes in the future Implementing proprietary solutions which are based on closedsource interfaces deprives the user of the option to either change the software components of energy monitoring or to make changes in the hardware used for reading meters Affordability of the system means quicker return of investment into energy monitoring The general assumption is that detailed and continuous energy monitoring is able to reduce expenses on energy consumption by 12 per cent in the long run This is achieved by detections of wasting breakdowns or incorrect settings of technology as well as thought motivating people to be more conscious about the ways they consume energy The importance of the above mentioned points and aspects is indeed arguable and it may vary in different segments and fields of industry but from our point of view these are the essential rules of a functional system of energy monitoring which is sustainable and efficient in the long run

title: Benchmarking Energy Performance
content: Compare the energy efficiency of your buildings 40 of all the energy used in the world is consumed in buildings and in their operation It is almost unbelievable how vastly different are buildings in terms of energy use Our team has encountered buildings of the same type but with a 100 difference in consumption There are significant discrepancies between office buildings of the A standard which we are monitoring the most energy efficient building of the A standard that we monitor has a yearly consumption of 169 kWhsqm while in the case of the least efficient building it is 304 kWhsqmEnergetick benchmarkingimgblogBenchmarking budov2png Why is it important to compare buildings 1 Comparison or benchmarking is the very first step in the process of improvement of energy efficiency It has been proven that even the basic version of benchmarking effectively reduces energy consumption and consequently energy expenses It may be surprising to you that more than half of saving of energy in buildings is achieved through implementation of lowcost or zerocost measures in the operation of the buildings 2 Benchmarking becomes an important strategic tool especially if the subject of its analysis is a large portfolio of buildings The vast amount of information thus received helps the administrator of the portfolio to make plans prioritize and allocate financial resources so that certain goals are achieved in terms of energy performance and sustainability Benchmarking basics Different buildings can give you different data and values There are several basic rules you should follow in order to avoid mixing apples with oranges 1 Compare buildings in the same climate zone 2 Compare buildings of similar height 3 Compare buildings with the same heat source 4 Compare buildings that are used in the same way The second point may be surprising but the height of the building is closely related to the equipment used in the building This is why a portfolio of building should be divided to at least three elementary categories Lowrise buildings middlerise buildings and highrise buildings Another criteria more suitable for a specific portfolio may be chosen Buildings should not be compared only to one another but also to the average and to the best performance If you seek help setting up the criteria for your energyrelated benchmarking project please do not hesitate to contact usencontactus Contact form

title: Energy Management and Curiosity
content: Are you curious enough Every human being is born with innate curiosity Right from the moment of our birth we start exploring and learning Unfortunately as we get older most of us gradually lose our curiosity Possibly because we use the proverb Curiosity killed the cat However curiosity is a key factor in achieving energy efficiency Let us take an example an administrative building with tenants and an administrator whose task from his position of the representative of the owner is to divide energy expenses between the individual tenants so that there is no remainder This task is fairly easy if the consumption is monitored only through several meters and if it is divided up proportionally based on the leased area usually in the form of deposits paid in advance and then reimbursed later Such a system does not allow any improvement towards energy efficiency as it does not motivate anybody to change the status quo The key is to motivate the tenants themselves If they are curious about their consumption and about how they use energy they can change the perspective of the owner of the building as well Also if they are curious about the energy expenses of other buildings of the same type they can learn more about efficiency of their own energy use Have you ever asked your neighbor how much electric energy or water he or she uses in a month Curiosity is crucial in energy management and in the work of those who study graphs tables values and data related to efficiency performance and consumption A successful energy manager is one that is seeks to unravel inconsistencies and to understand the analyzed data Have you ever thought about by how many per cent you can reduce your consumption but still keep maximum efficiency of operation Be curious

title: How to Cope With Energy Management
content: The words energy management scare many people Every day as part of my profession I meet senior managers who have to introduce new energy management processes and they are struggling with this task Usually they fear the unknown but the basic philosophy behind good energy management is actually embraced in the common sense of every manager Let me show you a few general rules moznaupsporyeditpngimgmoznaupsporyeditpng Define goals you want to reach it might be for example reduction of the average consumption per tenant or per a manufactured product till the end of the year Define responsibilities of the individual members of the team determine who is responsible for arrangement of meetings collection of data analyses Make others motivated to come up with solutions be it directly or in the form of a competition Establish regular meetings where achievements will be assessed and new goals will be set Most importantly Do not give energy for free The consumer needs to understand that energy is not free only then can he be motivated to save energy costs

title: Is the Power Engineer and Endangered Species?
content: The story is the same everywhere as expenses are reduced in every branch of business the pressure to eradicate some of the professions increases We are no longer surprised to see selfcheckout counters in supermarkets instead of real people Alternatively we do not even need a brickandmortar shops as we do our grocery shopping online Like watchmen or scriveners in the past clerks have also become an endangered species Is this the case of power engineers as well Is the power engineer becoming an endangered species because smart metering systems are gradually introduced Introduction of systems of smart metering means that volume of energy data that need to be processed analyzed and reported will double Until now a corporate power engineer was responsible for these tasks in most companies the dictionary provides the following description A power engineer is responsible for the provision of various buildings and their parts with sufficient supply of energy such as electric power gas water or steam As part of his job the power engineer also monitors consumption and makes sure that the energy supply is adequate and that the consumption of energy is economical He inspects the energy equipment and plans manages or carries out its maintenance He checks the expenses on the individual energies regularly and comes up with solutions that reduce the consumption The power engineer performs regular energy monitoring If you see the definition in the light of current technologies you may come to the conclusion that the power engineer indeed is endangered all the above mentioned tasks can be made fully automatic with no need of interference of a human being and the remaining responsibilities of an executive and management nature are transferred to financial departments and to senior management or they are outsourced The gradual increase in the prices of energy also increases the need to save energy Consequently the tasks of energy management are taken away from the power engineer and distributed among other employees and managers so that all departments and employees are aware of the need to use energy efficiently The more are the responsibilities of energy management transferred to others the less responsibility lies on the shoulders of the power engineer and energy management thus becomes decentralized Yes The corporate power engineer as we know him is not extinct but he is endangered

title: Management Is Measurement
content: There is an old saying that appears in almost all books on management There is no management without measurement This rule is crucial in energy management When information energy data is accurate readily available and reliable good decisions are much easier to make Though manual readings are often incomplete and unreliable many companies still depend on them even if millions of CZK worth of investments are at stake Automatic precise reading of energy meters brings the question of energy management energy consumption and expenses to a whole new level You are able to detect wasting even outside of your working hours you get alerts about breakdowns and defects you can verify if the invoices issued by the provider of energy is correct or you can in great detail monitor the impact of newly installed saving solutions One thing that is frequently mentioned in connection to this topic is the price of automatic reading Some time ago we inspected a compound of administrative buildings with the overall number of 140 energy meters all of them read manually It takes two days for the technician to make the round if he earns in average 300 CZK an hour and one work day is 75 hours the reading costs 4500 CZKmonth ie 54000 CZKyear For this price the building administrator gets a service which still however enables tenants to complain about undetected leaking of heat and incorrect invoicing and which does not provide the administration of the building with data necessary for improvement of energy efficiency The investment in automatic reading was assessed as worth of 220000 CZK including a sixyear guarantee period The payback period is from a purely financial point of view 4 years not to mention the comfort that remote reading brings This is food for thought

title: Office Building Energy Insigts
content: The results we present here are based on data gathered by the Enectiva team from 400 administration buildings located in various Czech cities of over 10000 residents Consumption of Electric Energy For 50 of administrative buildings electricity consumption per 1 m of used floor area varies from 501 to 1427 kWh m According to energy consumption we are the most active at work on Tuesdays and then Mondays Starting with Wednesday our activity only decreases until the end of the week The difference between Tuesdays and Fridays the day we work the least according to consumption data is 601 in average This difference is larger in openspace offices than in offices smaller than 200 m in this case the difference is only 363 Over the weekend the energy consumption of the average office decreases by 5417 compared to the consumption during working days When we consider electricity consumption per 1 m of used floor area we see that most buildings have the consumption of 525 kWhm per year This value very much depends on the technology used in the building and on whether there is cooling technology in the building or not The average yearly consumption per m of the whole analyzed set of buildings is 1106 kWh m the median value of the set is 905 kWh m Office Building Electricity Consumptionimgelectricity consumptionpng Water Consumption The case is very similar with water consumption which is the highest during working days in particular on Mondays and then on Tuesdays Water consumption is the lowest on Fridays The difference between Mondays and Fridays is 589 in average During the weekends water consumption decreases dramatically by 87 The same decrease takes place over state holidays as well The value of water consumed per square meter of used floor area is most commonly 165 l m a year and 50 of buildings have the consumption of 160 lm to 330 lm The average yearly consumption of the whole set of analyzed buildings is 3076 lm the median value of the sample is 2359 lm If the yearly water consumption of your building is lower than the median value of 3076 lm you belong to the better half of administrative buildings in terms of water consumption Water Consumption Office Buildingsimgwater consumptionpng Heat Consumption As for gas and heat the situation is much more complex Their consumption is influenced not only by our presence in the office but also by the weather especially the outside temperature Therefore there is no point in comparing individual days of the week as the consumption is parallel to the fluctuation of the outside temperature However it is interesting to see what happens to the consumption at weekends and to see whether the regulation of heating is set up correctly That is why we compared the data from Fridays with those of the nearest Saturdays The consumption decreased by 2831 As for the Sunday and Monday values the difference in heat consumption is 3879 The value of heat consumption per m is for most buildings 135 kWhm a year The heat consmuption for 50 of buildings varies from 123 to 221 kWhm the average consumption equals to 186 kWhm This differences are usually determined by the quality of the building envelope and by its qualities in terms of insulation The median value which gives us a much better idea than the average value is 169 kWhm Heat Consumption Office Buildingsimgheat consumptionpng Most of power waste takes place during the state holidays Generally in terms of consumption it is also valuable to look at the difference between public holidays and weekends We may consider public holidays comparable to Sundays in terms of the number of people working However electric energy consumption is higher by 48 than that on Sundays and the difference is even bigger when we consider heat consumption Energy Statistics Office Buildingsimgenergy statisticspng During public holidays heat consumption is 2840 higher than heat consumption over the nearest weekends and its value is therefore comparable to a regular working day This fact shows us that there still is room for further improvement of energy efficiency in commercial buildings

title: Smart City - technologies as a solution to the problems of the city
content: Smart City currently a very popular term encompasses in itself many meanings Generally speaking the term refers to application of modern technologies to operation of towns and cities Modern technologies can be applied within many sectors including transportation power engineering waste treatment lighting medical care etc all these can be improved by modern technologies The aim of such solutions putting aside political and businessrelated objectives is creating a city which is comfortable to live in and cheaper to maintain At least these should be the reasons why politicians get involved in the introduction of Smart City projects in their towns cities or regions Our company focuses on intelligent energy monitoring using the Enectiva application Our aims within Smart City reduction of energy demands and ecological strain simplification of the administration processes related to energy management reduction of operating costs and energy costs provision of a system that is not dependent on subsidies Currently around 15 cities in the Czech Republic use our application including Mlnk Jesenk Havorv Luhaovice The portfolio keeps expanding The way our monitoring is used changes as well Originally the application monitored energy consumed by street lights in particular it was designed to analyze costsaving projects within the regulation of street lighting The scope of the application has since then been expanded by monitoring of heat gas and water in schools kindergartens and city offices Mlnks Chief Energy Manager Mr Juraj Rapant provided us with the following reference Thanks to our cooperation with Enerfis we started using the Enectiva solution and we achieved a much more efficient system of energy management within the city We started with monitoring of costsaving projects in the field of street lights and since then we have been gradually adding more features including monitoring of water electricity and gas consumption We have been using Enectiva for over a year and during this time we were able to detect numerous cases of energy wasting which we would not be able to detect without continuous meter reading These savings paid off our initial investment in just one year As a Chief Power Engineer I appreciate that the costs for physical meter reading have been reduced as the meters are installed all around the city and that the administration tasks needed to process energy data from all meters have been made simpler

title: The Price of Energy Data
content: Are you a property manager facility manager building administrator or a building owner Then you have most likely already dealt with the question of how to collect energy data from your building in an efficient way Manual meter reading carried out by a technician is still the most widely used method However this obsolete method is in some ways unreliable and time and moneyconsuming and the larger the portfolio of administered buildings the more difficult the reading gets There are various solutions to this problem one of them is Enectiva However everyone who wants to work with energy data needs to accept the fact that even automatic data collection is not free either There are expenses that need to be taken into account like the costs of a suitable software or of remote meters usually of both Clients companies of the energy management market can be divided into two main groups those who have already realized the importance of quality energy data and those who will realize it in the future This month only I have encountered three cases of unnecessary wasting that could have been prevented if a competent energy monitoring system had been installed These cases were 12 million CZK worth of leaked gas 20000 CZK of damages caused by a defective safety valve in a boiler room and 200000 CZK worth of wasting caused by an incorrectly set up cooling system The companies involved in the above mentioned issues have learned their lesson and they now see the price of energy data from a whole new perspective

title: Cómo hacer frente a la gestión de la energía
content: Las palabras gestin energtica asustan a muchas personas Todos los das como parte de mi profesin me encuentro con que los altos directivos tienen que introducir nuevos procesos de gestin de la energa y luchan por conseguirlo Por lo general tienen miedo a lo desconocido pero la filosofa bsica detrs de una buena gestin energtica est en realidad en el sentido comn de cada gerente Le voy a ensear algunas reglas generales moznaupsporyeditpngimgmoznaupsporyeditpng Definir las metas que desea alcanzar como por ejemplo la reduccin del consumo medio por inquilino o por producto fabricado hasta fin de ao Definir las responsabilidades de los miembros del equipo determinar quin es el responsable de la organizacin de las reuniones de la recogida de datos anlisis Motive a los dems empleados para llegar a soluciones ya sea directamente o en mediante un concurso Establezca reuniones peridicas donde se evalen los logros y se establezcan nuevos objetivos Y lo ms importante la energa no es gratis Cuando el consumidor entienda que la energa no es gratuita se motivar para ahorrar costes

title: Comparativa de rendimiento de energía
content: Comparar la eficiencia energtica de sus edificios El 40 de toda la energa utilizada en el mundo se consume en los edificios y en su funcionamiento Es increble cmo son muy diferentes los edificios en trminos de consumo de energa Nuestro equipo se ha encontrado con edificios del mismo tipo pero con una diferencia del 100 en el consumo Existen discrepancias significativas entre los edificios de oficinas de tipo a que se estn monitoreando El edificio de mayor eficiencia energtica de tipo a que monitoreamos tiene un consumo anual de 169 kwhm mientras que en el caso de los menos eficientes el consumo es de 304 kwh m Por qu es importante comparar los edificios La comparacin de rendimiento o benchmarking es el primer paso en el proceso de mejora de la eficiencia energtica Se ha demostrado que incluso la versin ms bsica de evaluacin comparativa reduce eficazmente el consumo de energa y en consecuencia los gastos energticos Podra sorprenderle que ms de la mitad del ahorro de energa en los edificios se consiga mediante la aplicacin de medidas de bajo coste o de coste cero Benchmarking se convierte en una herramienta estratgica importante especialmente si el tema de su anlisis es una importante cartera de edificios La gran cantidad de informacin recibida ayuda al administrador a hacer planes priorizar y asignar recursos financieros para que se logren las metas en trminos de eficiencia energtica y sostenibilidad Conceptos bsicos de benchmarking Diferentes edificios pueden dar diferentes datos y valores Hay varias reglas bsicas que debe seguir para evitar confusiones 1 Comparar edificios de la misma zona climtica 2 Comparar edificios de altura similar 3 Comparar edificios que tienen la misma fuente de calor 4 Comparar edificios que se utilizan de la misma manera El segundo punto puede sorprenderle pero la altura de un edificio est estrechamente relacionada con los equipos utilizados en el mismo Por esta razn una cartera de edificios se dividir en al menos tres categoras primarias edificios de baja altura edificios de mediana altura y edificios de gran altura Se pueden elegir otros criterios ms adecuados para una cartera ms especfica Los edificios no deben compararse nicamente entre s sino tambin con la media para el mejor rendimiento de los mismos Si necesita ayuda para configurar los criterios para su proyecto de evaluacin comparativa energtica por favor no dude en contactar con nosotrosescontacto

title: El precio de los datos energéticos
content: Es usted administrador de una propiedad gerente de una instalacin administrador o dueo de un edificio Probablemente entonces ya ha tratado la cuestin de cmo recopilar los datos energticos de su edificio de una manera eficiente Las lecturas de los contadores manuales llevados a cabo por un tcnico siguen siendo el mtodo ms ampliamente utilizado Sin embargo este mtodo est obsoleto en cierto modo son poco fiables y consumen mucho tiempo y dinero y cuanto mayor es la cartera de edificios administrados ms difcil resulta la lectura Existen varias soluciones a este problema una de ellas es enectiva Sin embargo todos los que quieran trabajar con datos energticos tienen que aceptar el hecho de que incluso la recopilacin automtica de datos tampoco est libre de fallos Hay gastos que deben tenerse en cuenta al igual que los costes de un software adecuado o de contadores remotos por lo general de ambos Los clientes del mercado de la gestin energtica se pueden dividir en dos grandes grupos los que ya se han dado cuenta de la importancia de los datos energticos de calidad y los que se darn cuenta en el futuro Slo este mes hemos encontrado tres casos de prdidas innecesarias de energa que podran haberse evitado si se habra instalado un sistema competente de monitorizacin energtica Estos casos fueron una fuga de gas que se valor en 4304006 una vlvula de seguridad defectuosa que caus daos en una sala de calderas cost 71733 y por una emisin causada debido a un sistema de refrigeracin configurado incorrectamente se gastaron 717334 Las empresas que tuvieron estos problemas han aprendido la leccin y ahora ven el precio de los datos energticos desde una perspectiva totalmente nueva

title: ¿Es el ingeniero energético una especie en peligro de extinción?
content: La historia es la misma en todas partes como se reducen los gastos en todos los departamentos de la empresa la presin para eliminar algunas de las profesiones aumenta Ya no nos sorprende ver cajas de autoservicio en los supermercados en lugar de personas Por otra parte ni siquiera necesitamos tiendas de ladrillo y mortero para hacer nuestras compras ya que se pueden hacer por internet Como los centinelas o escribanos en el pasado los empleados tambin se han convertido en una especie en peligro de extincin es este el caso de los ingenieros energticos el ingeniero energtico se est convirtiendo en una especie en peligro de extincin debido a los sistemas de medicin inteligente que se introducen poco a poco La implantacin de sistemas de medicin inteligente implica que el volumen de datos energticos que necesitan ser procesados y analizados se duplicar Hasta ahora el ingeniero energtico corporativo era el responsable de estas tareas en la mayora de las empresas el diccionario ofrece la siguiente descripcin un ingeniero energtico es responsable del suministro de energa ya sea elctrica de gas de agua o vapor en distintos edificios Como parte de su trabajo el ingeniero energtico tambin monitorea el consumo y se asegura de que el suministro de energa es suficiente y que su consumo es econmico Se inspeccionan los planes y los equipos de energa y se gestiona y realiza el mantenimiento de los mismos Comprueba los gastos de las energas individualmente con regularidad y estudia soluciones para reducir el consumo El ingeniero energtico lleva a cabo la vigilancia regular de energa Si lee la definicin de ingeniero energtico y con las tecnologas actuales es posible llegar a la conclusin de que est de hecho est en peligro Todas las tareas anteriormente mencionadas se pueden realizar de forma automtica sin necesidad de un ser humano as como las restantes responsabilidades de carcter ejecutivo y de gestin que pueden ser transferidas a los departamentos financieros y de alta direccin o incluso externalizarlas El aumento gradual de los precios de la energa tambin ha hecho aumentar la necesidad de ahorrar energa En consecuencia las tareas de gestin de la energa se toman sin tener en cuenta a un ingeniero energtico y se distribuyen las tareas entre los dems empleados para que todos sean conscientes de la necesidad de utilizar la energa de manera eficiente Cuantos mayores son las responsabilidades de gestin de la energa transferida a los dems menor es la responsabilidad que recae sobre el ingeniero energtico y por lo tanto la gestin de la energa se descentraliza S el ingeniero energtico corporativo tal y como lo conocemos no se ha extinguido pero est en peligro

title: Gestión de la energía y la curiosidad
content: Eres lo suficientemente curioso Todo ser humano nace con una curiosidad innata Desde el momento en que nacemos empezamos a explorar y aprender Desafortunadamente a medida que envejecemos la mayora de nosotros perdemos poco a poco nuestra curiosidad Posiblemente porque usamos el refrn la curiosidad mat al gato Sin embargo la curiosidad es un factor clave en el logro de la eficiencia energtica Pongamos un ejemplo un edificio administrativo con sus empleados y un administrador cuya tarea es dividir los gastos de energa entre los empleados de modo que no haya descuadre Esta tarea es bastante fcil si el consumo se controla a travs de varios contadores y si se divide proporcionalmente basndose en el rea arrendada Pero de esta forma no se consiguen realizar mejora alguna hacia la eficiencia energtica ya que no motiva al personal a cambiar su status quo La clave es motivar a los empleados Si tienen curiosidad sobre su consumo y sobre cmo utilizan la energa pueden cambiar la perspectiva del propietario del edificio Adems si tienen curiosidad acerca de los gastos energticos de otros edificios del mismo tipo pueden aprender ms acerca de la eficiencia de su propio consumo de energa Alguna vez ha preguntado a su vecino la cantidad de energa elctrica o de agua que utiliza en un mes La curiosidad es crucial en la gestin de la energa y en el trabajo de los que estudian grficos tablas valores y datos relacionados con la eficiencia el rendimiento y el consumo Un gestor energtico exitoso es aquel que busca desentraar inconsistencias y comprender los datos analizados Alguna vez ha pensado en qu tanto por ciento puede reducir su consumo y aun as mantener la mxima eficiencia de funcionamiento sea curioso

title: La gestión es la medición
content: Hay un viejo refrn que aparece en casi todos los libros sobre gestin que dice no hay gestin sin medicin Esta regla es crucial en la gestin de la energa Cuando la informacin datos energticos es precisa fiable y se dispone fcilmente de ella las buenas decisiones son mucho ms fciles de tomar Aunque las lecturas manuales son a menudo incompletas y poco fiables muchas empresas todava dependen de ellas incluso si estn en juego miles de euros de inversin La lectura automtica de los contadores es precisa llevando la cuestin de la gestin energtica su consumo y los gastos a un nivel completamente nuevo Ser capaz de detectar cualquier prdida de energa incluso fuera de su horario de trabajo ya que se le enviarn alertas sobre posibles averas o defectos as como podr verificar si las facturas emitidas por el proveedor de energa son correctas y tambin podr monitorear con gran detalle el impacto de ahorro de las medidas que haya implantado Una cuestin que se menciona con frecuencia en relacin a este tema es el precio de la lectura automtica Hace algn tiempo inspeccionamos un complejo de edificios administrativos que contaba con 140 contadores de energa los cuales se lean manualmente Se necesitaban dos das para que el tcnico los leyera si l ganaba un promedio de 10 h y una jornada de trabajo es de 8 horas los costes de lectura eran de 162 mes es decir 1942 ao Por esta cantidad el administrador del edificio consegua un servicio que no permita a los inquilinos detectar una fuga de calor o una facturacin incorrecta y que no facilitaba la administracin del edificio para la mejora de la eficiencia energtica La inversin en la lectura automtica se presupuest en 791509 incluido un perodo de garanta de seis aos El periodo de recuperacin fue desde un punto de vista puramente financiero de 4 aos por no hablar de la comodidad que aport la lectura a distancia Este caso debera hacerle reflexionar

title: Gestione dell'Energia e Curiosità
content: Sei abbastanza curioso Ogni umano cresciuto con un innato senso di curiosit Proprio dal momento della nascita si comincia a esplorare ed imparare Purtroppo con linvecchiare la maggior parte di noi a poco a poco perde la propria curiosit Forse perch usiamo il proverbio La curiosit uccide il gatto Tuttavia la curiosit un fattore chiave per raggiungere lefficenza energetica Per esempio un edificio amministrativo con inquilini e un amministratore il cui compito della sua posizione da rappresentante del proprietario dividere le spese energetiche tra i singoli inquilini in modo che non vi sia alcun resto Questo compito abbastanza facile se il consumo controllato attraverso diversi contatori e se suddiviso porporzionalmente sulla base della superfice affittata di solito sotto forma di depositi anticipati e poi rimborsati pi tardi Tale sistema non consente alcun miglioramento verso lefficienza energetica in quanto non motiva nessuno a cambiare lo status quo La chiave quello di motivare gli inquilini stessi Se sono curiosi di sapere il loro consumo e su come utilizzare lenergia possono cambiare la prospettiva del propetario delledificio a loro piacimentoInoltre se sono curiosi di conoscere le spese energetiche di altri edifici dello stesso tipo loro possono imparare di pi sullefficenza del proprio consumo energetico Vi siete mai chiesti quanta energia elettrica o quanta acqua spreca il vostro vicino di casa La curiosit fondamentale nella gestione dellenergia e nel lavoro di coloro che studiano grafici tabelle i valori e dati relativi alla efficienza prestazioni e consumi Un gestore di energia esperto uno che cerca di svelare le incongruenze e di comprendere i dati analizzati Avete mai pensato di che percentuale possibile ridurre il consumo ma mantenendo comunque la massima efficenza nel funzionamento Si curioso

title: Monitoraggio Energia

in materia finanziaria Inoltre se il sistema viene mantenuto semplice e di facile comprensione costi di formazione di nuovi utenti sono significativamente ridotti La regola generale che un buon dati devono essere disponibili sempre e dovunque soprattutto oggi che la flessibilit e la rapidit di decisione un prodotto molto richiesto e un vantaggio competitivo Avere i tuoi dati energetici online permette di avere report automatici e avvisi inviati diretti in caso di sprechi al tuo indirizzo email o anche il telefono cellulare Un sistema aperto ma sicura basata su interfacce aperte offre allutente la possibilit di scegliere e di apportare modifiche in futuro Limplementazione di soluzioni proprietarie che si basano su interfacce closedsource priva lutente della possibilit di cambiare i componenti software di monitoraggio dellenergia o di apportare modifiche lhardware utilizzato per la lettura dei contatori Accessibilit del sistema significa un pi rapido ritorno degli investimenti in monitoraggio energetico Il presupposto generale che il monitoraggio continuo di energia in grado di ridurre i costi relativi al consumo di energia del 12 per cento nel lungo periodo Ci si ottengono le rilevazioni di deperimento guasti o di impostazioni errate della tecnologia cos come il pensiero di motivare le persone ad essere pi consapevoli su come consumano lenergia Limportanza dei punti sopra elencati e gli aspetti discutibile e pu variare nei diversi segmenti e settori industriali ma dal nostro punto di vista queste sono le regole essenziali di un sistema funzionale di monitoraggio energetico che sostenibile ed efficiente a lungo andare

odety z midel pmo na Enectiva servery Tmto zpsobem lze Enectivu takt integrovat i s jinmi vrobci harwarovch zazen kter zajiuj odety midel hellips etnm systmem Nklady z faktur za energie mohou bt zaslny pmo do Enectivy a ta je nsledn vyuv pro statistiky souvisejc s energetickm managementem Ji nemuste zadvat tyto daje pouze run ale proces lze pln automatizovat hellips firemnmi ERP systmy Stejn jako s etnm SW lze Enectivu integrovat i s ostatnmi firemnmi systmy Enectiva pak doke v rmci energetickho managementu zpracovvat daje o vrob obsazenosti prodeji a dal parametry kter jsou podstatn pro title: Často kladené dotazy
content: Je nutn nco instalovat NikoliEnectiva je provozovna formou sluby a tuto slubu lze vyut z jakhokoli zazen kter je pipojeno k Internetu a souasn m webov prohle Vae data jsou Vm kdykoli a odkudkoli k disozici bez nutnosti jakkoli instalace Komu pat data v Enectiv Data od vech naich zkaznk jsou stle jejich majetkem lenov tmu Enectiva je mohou vyut pouze k hromadnm statistickm elm pro zlepen nabzench slueb Jakm zpsobem se zadvaj do systmu odety z midel Existuj dva zpsoby Nejep je vyut nkter z naich otestovanch komniktor a pipojit midla do systmu k automatickmu sbru Ve probh pak pln automaticky s nulovou chybovost Druhou variantou je monost zadvat odety do systmu run i importovat hromadn z xls i csv soubor Jak dlouho trv zvazek u Enectivy Typicky slubu platte formou msnch plateb Pro naeho zkaznka to m vhodu e kdykoli se me rozhodnout pro redukovn i rozen slueb a vdy bude platit pesn za to co aktuln vyuv Ron platba je u ns takt mon Pi jejm vyuit poskytujeme slevu 10 Jakou formou probhaj platby Aktuln mete vyuvat bezhotovostnch pevod na n et kter je uveden v kontaktech Pokud chci pestat vyuvat slubu Enectiva jak mohu odejt Je to velmi jednoduch sta nezaplatit dal msn platbu a k Vaemu tu ztratte pstup Na tuto situaci budete 2x upozornn emailem V ppad e nezaplatm nebo zrum et m data budou smazna V ppad nezaplacen msnho tarifu ztratte pstup k Vaemu tu ale data nebudou smazna dalch 30 dn Pokud nedojde k obnoven tu bhem tchto 30 dn budou data nsledn smazna Jak jsou zabezpeena moje data Vechna data jsou zlohovna kad den a jsou uloena v certifikovanch datovch loitch dle ISO 270001 a TIER III Data jsou takt v relnm ase replikovna na nkolik server aby byla zaruena jejich 100 dostupnost v zvislosti na monch HW a sovch problmech Jak vechny energie lze v systmu monitorovat Aktuln mete vyut monitoring pro elektrickou energii teplo plyn chlad a vodu S tm e jednotliv energie mohou mt jemnj dlen nap na elektinu pro chlazen i vzduchotechniku teplou a studenou vodu i teplo potebn na ppravu tepl vody

content: layout manual title About Enectiva schema about Comprehensible energy management Set up reports and notifications fornbsphigh consumption Clear energy data innbspone place Quality information for quality decisions Uncovering wasting motivating savings Energy management you understand Without Enectiva With Enectiva Each month a designated person spends one whole day making the rounds of all the energy and water meters in the building He needs to go through shafts and narrow spaces and write down all the data Enectiva is a complete solution for energy monitoring that reads all the meters automatically in definable intervals and saves the data into a regularly backed up database The technician spends another hour entering the collected data in an Excel table and analyzing them He may find out that some of the data are incorrect and needs to doublecheck them at the meters The technician as well as the management of the company have access to the data and analyses in Enectiva at all times The system sends an alert to your mobile phone if certain limits are exceeded The data from the table are sent to the building owner who then has to divide it up between the individual tenants who then often complain about being wronged At the end of the month accounting of all the energies is carried out automatically by Enectiva The tenants have access to the application and can check their consumption any time It is the technician himself who usually comes up with the Excel tables and with the system of reading the meters this means that there is no one who can work with the data when the technician is sick or on holiday Access to application may be granted to an unlimited number of users Energy data are available to the management of the company and to the tenants at all times

content: layout manual title Enectiva REST API translations null published true kw schema api Enectiva REST API Enectiva REST API Librarian allows everyone to use functionality of Enectiva system without having to install hardware for automatic data collection Thanks to the API Enectiva can be integrated with your business systems accounting systems website or building management system BMS Currently the API is available for sending energy readings and custom time series eg data from meteostations as described below Easily connect Enectiva with your systems through an API Use cases hellipwith BMS Building management systems can transmit data from the meters directly to Enectiva servers In this way Enectiva can be easily integrated with hardware from other producers of metering systems hellipwith accounting systems The cost of energies from invoices can be sent directly to Enectiva which subsequently uses them for energy management statistics You no longer need to enter this information manually but the process can be fully automated hellipwith ERP systems Like with accounting software Enectiva can also be integrated with other enterprise systems Enectiva is then able to leverage data about occupancy production sales and other parameters in the context of energy management to enhance energy benchmarking hellipwith your own weather station If you want meteodata to match exactly with your property your weather station can connect directly to the Enectiva server mdash it can send temperature data that are subsequently linked with your account and the gasheat consumption statistics How it works Using the API is very simple the readings are sent in HTTP requests ie using the technology which underpins the web and which can be easily used in any environment with an internet access API checks every received reading and forwards it to Enectiva where readings are reflected in the statistics Complete technical documentation contains the code for more than a dozen programming languages therefore connection of an existing system with Enectiva is a matter of just a few minutes Example of a manual request to send a reading cURL curl include request POST header ContentType applicationvndapijson header Authorization Bearer longapitoken header Accept applicationvndapijson databinary data time 20151118T0954230100 state 12345678 meterid 40AABB007 unit kW sender testscript01 httpsapienectivacz41115readingscustomerId For sending readings regularly it is sufficient to connect the provided code to a data source and send readings periodically

content: layout default title Enectiva Rules schema rules Enectiva Rules We are aware that privacy and information security are important For that reason we never give any private information about you or your company to third parties except the institutions that are allowed by law to access this information in case they ask for it If you become a user of the Enectiva software solution we get your company or personal information such as name address bank contact email phone number etc By logging in the system you reveal your IP address browser type operating system and other similar information By using Enectiva you give us more detailed information about your real estates occupants or the technology used in the buildings When working with all this information we abide by the following rules Your personal or company information are only used for the purposes of mutual communication between the Enectiva team and our customer which is necessary for this business partnership We use the contact information to inform our customers about the news related to the Enectiva product and other complementary services we offer The data inserted to the system by the user always belong to the user They can change or delete them at any time We never share user data with third parties except the institutions where the obligation is given by law Only authorized persons from the Enectiva team have access to user data User data can be used by the Enectiva team for aggregate analyses across all users and these can be further used to develop new services or improve the Enectiva system In the case there is a change within these rules and you are an Enectiva user you will be informed by an email sent to the address provided during your registration If you have any question concerning the rules of using the Enectiva system do not hesitate to contact us on infoenectivacz

content: layout default title FAQ schema faq Do I need to install anything No you do not Enectiva operates as a service and as such it is available on all devices which are connected to the Internet and which have a web browser Your data are available anytime anywhere even without installation Who owns the data in Enectiva Our customers data remain their property The members of the Enectiva team can only use them for statistical purposes and for improvement of the system How do I enter meter readings into the system There are two options The best way is to install one of our attested communicators and establish a remote system of meter reading which operates automatically with zero error rates The second option is to enter the readings manually into the system or through mass imports of xls or csv files How long does the commitment last The standard form of payment is through monthly installments In this way customers can reduce or expand their services at any time and pay only for what they are using at a given moment Yearly payments are possible as well for yearly payments we grant a 10 discount How are the payments made You can pay using bank transfers to the account of our company details are to be found in the contact section If I wish to stop using Enectiva how can I withdraw Withdrawing is very simple you just do not make your monthly payment and you consequently lose access to your Enectiva account You will be notified about this fact by email twice Are my data erased if I miss a payment or deactive my account If you stop paying your monthly installments you will be denied access to your account but your data will not be erased until 30 days after that If your account is not reactivated within 30 days your data will be erased Are my data secured Backup copies are made of all data in Enectiva every day and they are deposited in repositories certified in the ISO 270001 and TIER III standards At the same time the data are replicated to several servers in real time so that their availability is ensured even if there are hardware or network problems Which energies can be monitored in the system Now you can use Enectiva to monitor electrical energy heat cold gas and water The individual energies can also be monitored in greater detail you can keep track of electricity used for air conditioning of cold and hot water separately or of electricity used for heating of water

content: layout feature title Functions of the system schema features published true feature yes Detailed Consumption and Costs Statistics With Enectiva all your data concerning consumption will be neatly arranged and organized in one place In this way you can monitor the overall energy consumption in the building gas cold water hot water heat cold electric power mdash separate for the ventilation system lighting appliances or cold generation operation Furthermore you can work with energy monitoring separately according to the various uses of energy You can for instance monitor the electricity consumed by the operation of AC units lightning systems or cooling devices All energy data can be displayed in technical units as well as in financial ones 1 2 3 4 1 Choose energy for which you want to see statistical data 2 Set the parameters of the graph you wish to display 3 Choose the time period and click on Display 4 All reports can be download in the xls format Proportional Graphs Proportional graphs show the influence of energy on the final costs the energy usage of various parts of the building compared to the overall consumption of the building or the influence of the occupants facilities and unmeasured consumption Energy auditors or power engineers will appreciate the fact that Enectiva shows the unmeasured consumption ie the difference between the total sum of all the data from all the monitored readers and the actual final data on the main reader used for invoicing Comparative Graphs They serve to compare the usage of two or more parts on the same level mdash ie benchmarking Do you wish to compare the heat consumptions per square meter in all your buildings Comparative graphs are here to do that for you You can also compare individual tenants among one another or manufacturing sites according to their production Monthly Consumption Enectiva shows you the development of the use of individual energy resources during the year Moreover you can combine the graph with the development of temperature and thus control if the development of consumption corresponds to the climatic conditions in a given location Thanks to the integrated price lists of all utilities you can switch these graphs also to a final costs diagram When you click on the column that represents a certain month you will see the daily statistics and if you click on a particular day you will get to the level of individual hours You return by clicking outside of the column Development Graphs They show the cumulative sum of the consumption or costs In this way you can very easily display the growth rate of your consumption during the monitored period Automatic Reports It is very easy to set up automatically generated reports about daily weekly or monthly consumptions costs or results of saving measures you have implemented By making these routine tasks automatic you will take away much of the administrative strain of your team 1 2 1 Automatic reports can be defined for any graph in Enectiva 2 Choose the frequency in which the report will be sent to you Regular Time Report After setting the time interval this type of report will automatically send the data chosen by you directly to your email The extent and makeup of the data in the report depends only on you You can add consumption and costs data to the report in the form of both charts and graphs Each user can customize his report makeup and receive only data that are of interest or importance to him Thus you do not have to go through large amount of data and look for those relevant to you Automatic Notices The job of an emergency notice is to inform you that a certain critical point has been reached As with the regular reports you decide what it is that Enectiva will monitor It can control for example the exceeding of a certain consumption or costs figure the necessity to inspect some part of the equipment or a measuring device the change of outside temperature or thanks to Enectivas connection to energy exchanges even the development of energy prices on the PEX and EEX exchanges With the automatic notices correctly set you will able to detect many cases of wasting throughout the year Saving Analysis If you realize any energy project on your building or if you introduce costsaving measures the second and no less important phase of such a project follows mdash the monitoring of appreciation and optimization Not even the best design of a project or measure can cover all factors influencing the development of the projects appreciation Thus the monitoring and assessment of the progress and the following optimization are indispensable for all such projects 1 2 3 4 1Currently attained monthly savings 2Prediction of future savings and costs in the years to follow 3Predicted and current cashflow of the given energy project 4Summary of economic data on the project Enectiva helps you with this task It makes all calculations for you and on one single page you can easily see the consumption development and its comparison with the average consumption during the last three years You can further see the monthly savings made by the measure and the development of and prediction for the financial side of the project using the cash flow method based on economic parameters As a result you can easily find out whether the project is still in the stage of repaying the investment or of profitability and also the current estimated NPV value at the end of the projects lifespan Meteodata Enectiva is connected to the network of weather stations all around the Czech Republic When entering the input data of a building you chose the weather station nearest to it Enectiva will then receive its climatic conditions information which you can display in a single graph with the consumption of individual energy resources Thus you can easily control whether the energy used on heating and cooling corresponds to the outside climatic conditions Such comparison easily detects mistakes in the regulation setting of the mentioned systems 1 2 3 1 Tick the temperature display option 2 Detect wasting in heating or cooling 3 Display the average minimum or maximum temperature Unlimited Number of Users under a Licence Enectivas licence system is unique on the Czech market mainly due to its applicability to a number of buildings and meters that are monitored The number of users or access PCs is not important You determine the number of user accounts yourself directly in the Enectiva interface according to your immediate needs without any of the changes influencing your licence invoice Another advantage of this kind of licence is that there is no need to contact the sales team in order to increase or decrease the number of user accounts and to deal with the related paperwork The result is a faster administration of user accounts that responds immediately to your current needs and the companys structure 1 2 3 1Enter the login data of the new user 2Define the rights of the new user 3If needed enter other information such as billing data Manual As Well As Automatic Meter Reading Are Supported Meter reading data can be put into Enectiva either manually or they can be sent in via a remote device Automatic readings save the time of your technicians and they allow you to set the reading frequency in the range from ten minutes to one day Enectiva supports a wide range of hardware products that enable remote meter reading no matter whether the data are collected on a wire or wireless basis Similarly the producer and the type of the remote meter do not matter Enectiva is an open system whose interface is freely available to the public For manual input you can use a simple form right within Enectiva or for example to input older meter reading data a prepared form in the xls format MS Excel You can also open each of the meters separately and enter the reading data manually 1 2 3 1 You simply enter the readings of all energies using just one simple form 2 Even when entering data you can watch the development of the consumption based on the last three readings 3 Once the data is saved they are projected to the graphs and statistics which you can then use in invoicing Those of our customers who administer a large number of buildings use the option of combining automatic readings with manual ones This poses no problem for Enectiva It is entirely up to the client what meters will be read in which ways Integrated Energy Price Lists Enectiva contains the price lists of all energy suppliers active in the Czech Republic You choose your distributor in the system put in the unit price for the utility arranged with the supplier and Enectiva will automatically count the overall costs according to the formulas given by ERO Energy Regulatory Office We update the prices whenever a new price is announced by ERO 1 2 3 1 Choose name supplier and energy type 2 Enter the unit price of the commodity 3 Display other components of the price including the distribution fee Events and notices You can enter any change that occurs in your building or portfolio into Enectiva for example the heatcold source replacement a change of the energy supplier a change of the energy price windows replacement thermal insulation of the object etc You can then view these changes in monthly consumption graphs and thus you will be able to see what impact these events had on consumption and on costs 1 2 1 Saved events are displayed directly in the consumption overview 2 You will see what impact the event had on consumption Enectiva also allows you to set up notices in case of an unexpected rise or drop in consumption outside temperature costs etc If such a change happens Enectiva will automatically send a notice to all the email addresses that you have defined in the system With this function you will be able to avoid all unnecessary costs in case of breakdowns water or gas leakage and you will be able to quickly react to unexpected changes in weather 1 2 3 4 1 Define the criteria of the notice 2 Write the text of the notice that will be sent to the recipient 3 Choose the recipients of the notice 4 Avoid unnecessary costs related to for instance nighttime breakdowns Easy to Use Interface Even the not technically oriented users can understand energy management During the development of the user interface our team focused on maximum ease and intuitiveness of Enectiva All functions and controls are designed in such a way that after a short initial training each user gets quickly familiar with Enectiva An inspiration during the development of the user interface and its functions were for example products of Google Easy Management of Meters In Enectiva meters are included in the floor plans of a building Therefore you can easily display the individual floors of a building and edit the meters directly from the plans This saves you the toilsome searching through documents and charts in order for you or your technician to locate the various meters Function DragampDrop Enectiva tries to solve any task in the most simple and elegant way possible The DragampDrop function enables you to move all data to a newly selected higher category by simply grabbing and dragging an occupant a building or a compound For example if you manage a portfolio of more investors and one buys a real estate from the other you transfer all data about this real estate into the new owners portfolio with a single move Other functions Even the not technically oriented users can understand energy management During the development of the user interface our team focused on maximum ease and intuitiveness of Enectiva All functions and controls are designed in such a way that after a short initial training each user gets quickly familiar with Enectiva An inspiration during the development of the user interface and its functions were for example products of Google Connection to the PEX and EEX Exchanges Thanks to its connection to the PEX and EEX energy exchanges you can follow the development of electric power and gas prices directly from the Enectiva interface In this way you can easily watch the prices development trend and invite tenders for an energy supplier at a convenient moment Using the automatic reports you can also set Enectiva to send you a notice as soon as the energy price reaches the desired value Google Maps Supported Do you need to quickly look up information on several different buildings in your portfolio Forget the annoying searching through many archived files In Enectiva you can switch from one building to another with only three clicks thanks to its connection to Google Maps Facility management Enectiva contains the basic features of facility management such as the following parameters total floor area gross floor area or gross leasable area These areas can be distinguished in Enectiva according to their use for example as offices storerooms facilities retail etc Similarly you can input the number of occupants of the object parking spots kitchenettes WCs urinals and the like All these parameters are divided into the overall number and the currently occupied or used ones As a result Enectiva can recalculate the consumption and costs to the specific consumption or specific costs according to the selected criterion The data are archived and you can view the time development of these parameters at any time in the future
